title: A DRESS OF A LADY IN LIGHT ROYAL BLUE!
content: (Image from the "MY LIFE" blog)  -  Alas in previous views,  A hint here and there of  the truths...  Show here at length  The woman's great strength,  In most inviting hues!  -  Seeing most of this dress,  Admirers can only express....  An audible "WOW"  A beauty and how!  The blue of calm loveliness!  -  An imager one wants to keep,  A dream not just in sleep...  We're truly impressed  By this blue dress,  And the woman wearing it --neat!  -  Jonathan Caswell  An opinion poem about a very attractiv e post!
contentWithMarkup:
(Image from the "MY LIFE" blog)

-

Alas in previous views,

A hint here and there of  the truths...

Show here at length

The woman's great strength,

In most inviting hues!

-

Seeing most of this dress,

Admirers can only express....

An audible "WOW"

A beauty and how!

The blue of calm loveliness!

-

An imager one wants to keep,

A dream not just in sleep...

We're truly impressed

By this blue dress,

And the woman wearing it --neat!

-

Jonathan Caswell

An opinion poem about a very attractiv e post!
